About

MIT CREON is the Arts and Literature Event of MITCOE. This event is organized by the magazine team of the college, SPANDAN. This year MIT CREON is to be held on 15th and 16th of February 2018. Creativity at its peak, CREON is an unique fest which has something for everyone.

MARVEL vs DC

Marvel Entertainment and itâ€™s contemporary, DC , started an inevitable battle of super powers which was hard to overlook. Ever since the rivalry had itâ€™s inception, it triggered the ever surging solace provided to the population. This made us realize how a battle could unite two sides of the same genre motivating each of the other to do better, fight better and entertain better.
